Reviews.Title: I love my new phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa S. Young
Reviews.Content: I got this phone and put a straight talk Sims in it and the service works really good in my area. I also love that this phone is white. I've been wanting a white phone and now I got one yay!!!! I really like the camera on it. Alot better than my old phone. Overall i'm really happy with my purchase :)

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Asha
Reviews.Content: Its a good phone. I was happy to know it works with my simple mobile sim card. The bad thing about it is that its a 3g phone... in the phone description, it doesnt say just want to give you all a heads up... other than have slow internet connection speed, its a really good phone

Reviews.Title: Did not like it
Reviews.Author: shellmp2
Reviews.Content: The phone is very slow when down loading, checking, or surfing the web. It is very user friendly and nice size

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Well I got this phone for my girlfriend and she loves it and I think it looks and works great too

Reviews.Title: Isn't as compatible as described
Reviews.Author: Lisa Hall
Reviews.Content: It's a nice phone, but I can't send or receive pictures, camera isn't good at all it has a fuzzy picture. I probably will not order again

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Tirhas hailu
Reviews.Content: I had no problem with this product since i got it and everything works great. And it is a good price.

Reviews.Title: Peice of crap
Reviews.Author: Emily Cline
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from this seller and it was a peice of crapthe phone was very slow and not smooth at all.I DO NOT reccommend !

Reviews.Title: They were ok except (see below)
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: The company that I got the service from told me that they would work, but they tried everything to maker them connect but was unable to get them to work.  Your company was very good.  It was  only about five days and I had my money back.  Never had that happen before.thanksI will be back.

Reviews.Title: motorla
Reviews.Author: Michael Donohue "kelly"
Reviews.Content: it didnt have coverage  were i needed it the most it might work better for someone else but for me it sucked

Reviews.Title: Cheap made in china
Reviews.Author: A.a.a
Reviews.Content: When i purchased this phone i thought its original Motorola guess what?? It's not its a cheap Chinese version of it hate the color and the bright of the phone its slow and it feels so cheap if only I can take it back ,hate it

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Android OS, v2.3.7 (Gingerbread); 8 MP Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) with autofocus, LED flash and Geo-tagging; 480p@30fps Video Capture
4" TFT capacitive touchscreen display; Multi-touch input method; Moto Switch UI 2.0; Touch-sensitive controls
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot; Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP, EDR
GPS with A-GPS support; 800 GHz Scorpion CPU, Adreno 200 GPU, 512 MB RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTOLUXE XT615 Unlocked GSM Phone with Touchscreen, Android 2.3 OS, 8MP Camera, A-GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and microSD Slot - White
